name: FHNG (Five Horror Nights with Guny's)
description:
FNAF GAME

A simple FNAF FanGame, the game is in development and could not be finished yet, new features will be added to the game soon and I plan to add some experimental mode and better made item collections.

Game version: BETA 0.4

⚠️ Soon a button will be added to be able to restart the game, the game was originally made on another platform, but little by little I will adapt it. ⚠️
